cause.description:
Ninjas are the supreme force in the universe. We are dedicated to defeating mostly pirates; but we also destroy vikings, cowboys, vampire, valkyries, undead, etc. In turn, we will become the most epic, silent and deadly force this planet has ever seen.
1. To eliminate pirates, vikings, cowboys, vampire, valkyries, undead, etc.
2. The rule the earth with our arts of assassination
cause.mission: Eliminate pirates, and all who support them, to become the supreme epic force
cause.name: The Ninja Party
